description: Smallest n-digit prime containing only digits 3 and 4, or 0 if no such prime exists.
mathematica: Table[SelectFirst[FromDigits/@Tuples[{3,4},n],PrimeQ],{n,18}] (* The program uses the SelectFirst function from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 29 2015 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jan 04 1999.
